Adobe Reader 8.1 Released

Jun 6, 2007 Aaron Parker

Adobe have released version 8.1 of Reader that includes updates for Office 2007 and Windows Vista, including preview in Outlook 2007. I’ll update my Adobe Reader deployment tools as soon as I can, however I don't see any reason why my existing transform files won't work with this version my existing transform files won’t work with this version, so expect updates soon. If you are looking to download the latest version here is the direct download link:

http://ardownload.adobe.com/pub/adobe/reader/win/8.x/8.1/enu/AdbeRdr810_en_US.exe
